snippet.title: 99 Spirits Official Trailer - Now Available
snippet.description:
Release trailer for the Japanese Puzzle RPG '99 Spirits' by TORaIKI, localized for English-speaking audiences by Fruitbat Factory.

99 Spirits is now available for purchase!

Available from http://sites.fastspring.com/fruitbatfactory/product/99spiritsdeluxe?tags=spirits and most major distributors.
